title: Does anyone know what this recovery mail id is?
content: So it's been quite long since I logged into my pesi mail id and today when I do it's asking this. Does anyone know this mail id or any other way I can get over this ?

comments.body: The mail id which you have given for recovering your account:)
I wish it were that simple. This account is created by the college so its them who have set the recovery mail id.

Yes its created by college ,
Buy they wont be adding the recovery email by them self 

We should add it after we receive the credentials form college.
ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ any idea on what I can do now ?

I think u have reach out to support team!

They might respond late :)

The one u'd have mentioned during admission 
The one which is used for official communication and announcements from the University side
It's a gmail account, college will not create a gmail account for you.
Do you know the support team mail id ?
Ohk.. Do you whats the support mail id ?
U mean a contact of an admin at PES office?
